description: This VonHaus TV bracket is in the popular cantilever style, but in an ultra slim bracket. The TV bracket is designed to fit flat screen LCD, LED, 3D and Plasma style TVs between 26 and 55 inches. This TV bracket is designed to be compliant with VESA standards and VESA compatibility: 75x75mm, 100mm x 100mm, 100mm x 200mm, 200mm x 200mm, 200mm x 400mm, 300mm x 300mm, 400mm x 400mm. Please check your TV's VESA dimensions by measuring between the mounting holes before purchase.This TV bracket is designed to be universal, and fits all of the major manufacturer makes and models. The TV bracket also includes a unique tilting mechanism which can be used to angle the TV up and down 15 (up & down) to ensure you have the ideal viewing angle. Once you get the perfect angle you can lock the TV bracket in place. With a 180 Swivel function the TV can also be angled left or right 180 and even adjust the screen 3 (left & right).This TV bracket is made from solid reinforced heavy gauge steel, and is weight rated to 88lbs. It is quick and easy to install, with multiple wall fixing points. This TV bracket comes complete with full user instructions and free fitting hardware.When this TV bracket is fully folded, it is only 56mm from the wall. When it is fully extended, it is up to 510mm from the wall. If your TV required the adaptor plates (included with this TV bracket), this will add 100mm or 200mm extra distance for TV's with a VESA of 300mm x 300mm or 400mm x 400mm.
title: VonHaus by Designer Habitat Ultra Slim Cantilever Swivel & Tilt Wall Mount TV Bracket for 26-55" for LCD, LED, 3D, Plasma TVs. Load Capacity 88lbs
